      public Camera(String name, edu.wpi.first.math.geometry.Transform3d transform, org.photonvision.PhotonPoseEstimator.PoseStrategy strategy, edu.wpi.first.math.Matrix<edu.wpi.first.math.numbers.N3,edu.wpi.first.math.numbers.N1> singleTagStdDevs, edu.wpi.first.math.Matrix<edu.wpi.first.math.numbers.N3,edu.wpi.first.math.numbers.N1> multiTagStdDevs)
      Constructs a camera configuration.
      Parameters:
      name - Camera name in PhotonVision
      transform - Camera transform relative to robot
      strategy - Pose estimation strategy
      singleTagStdDevs - Standard deviations for single tag detection
      multiTagStdDevs - Standard deviations for multi-tag detection
